‘wiyaruwata erehiwa, jiwithaya wenuwen‘ thema kara ganimin lankawe siwil sanwidhana wishala pramanayak ekwa sanwidhanaya karana ‘wiyaruwata erehiwa, widiye wirodhaya‘ pasugiya(05) da eppawala pawathi wadasatahane kriyakari prawina gayana shilpi jayathilaka bandara athulu kriyakarinta saha hiru madhya jalaye thisara saman mahathata pahara di ohuge kamarawata barapathala hani sidu kirimata wirodhayapamin ema marayin wahama athadanguwata ganna lesa balakaramin wirodhathawayak eeye(07) ude 11ta eppawala nagaraye marayin paharadun sthanaye di pawathwiya.
